activities: Eventbrite operates www.eventbrite.com and various European ccTLDs that are variants of www.eventbrite.com.  Through these websites and its software and services, Eventbrite empowers people all over the world to plan, promote and sell tickets to their events.  In connection with these services, Eventbrite may collect, use, store, transfer, disclose and otherwise process personal data from the EEA and/or Switzerland.  Eventbrite may also receive such personal data from its event organizer users who input that data into its systems and from other affiliates, customers, suppliers and other businesses in the EEA and/or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: TRUSTe US-EU Safe Harbor Program for Dispute Resolution
recoursemech:
Human resources data complaints: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)

Other types of complaints: TRUSTe Safe Harbor
